headline: Equity Residential Appoints Chris Carr to Board of Trustees
summary: CHICAGO, July 24, 2025--Equity Residential (NYSE: EQR) today announced the appointment of Chris Carr to the Company’s Board of Trustees to serve until the next annual meeting of shareholders. Mr. Carr qualifies as an independent trustee under the New York Stock Exchange’s listing standards. He will serve on the Company’s Audit and Corporate Governance Committees. With this appointment, the Company’s Board will increase to 11 members, nine of whom are independent.
